messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.CurrentPathIn: Adds an indicator for the current category (and generic Type) path to component attachers.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.FavoritesCate: Adds 'Favorites' categories to component attachers and ProtoFlux node selector roots and makes categories and components / nodes favoritable.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.FixedBackButt: Places the 'Back' button on component attachers outside of the scrollable area.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.FixedCancelBu: Places the 'Cancel' button on component attachers outside of the scrollable area.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.GenericPreset: Allows saving custom generic Type arguments as presets, which will be added to the list of Common Generic Types on any valid Component / Node.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.Injector.Desc: Makes the component selector generation and listing modular by handling it through events.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.RecentsCatego: Adds 'Recents' categories to the component attacher and ProtoFlux node browser roots which display the latest used ones.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.SearchBar.Des: Adds a searchbar to component selectors which allows searching components or ProtoFlux nodes.
